verbose_text: Altogether these results show that the endogenous Tnt1 elements are significantly less methylated at asymmetrical positions than the silenced LTR-GFP-LTR transgenes (XREF_FIG), and suggest a correlation between high methylation at asymmetrical positions at the LTRs and silencing of the Tnt1 promoters.
evidence: Tnt1 elements are significantly less methylated
